      • countByTypesAndItemsAndOrg

        public static Integer countByTypesAndItemsAndOrg(String types,
                                                 String items,
                                                 long orgId,
                                                 Float lat,
                                                 Float lon,
                                                 Integer dist)
        Count all published offers that match a list of types, items and a specified organisation ID
        Parameters:
        types - a list of E_OfferType as comma-separated string (or null)
        items - a list of items as comma-separated string (or null)
        orgId - an organisation ID (or -1)
        Returns:
        the number of published offers for the given parameters

      • searchByOfferTypes

        public static List<AHOffer> searchByOfferTypes(E_OfferType[] types,
                                               int from,
                                               int to)
        Search all published offers for the given indices and offer types
        Parameters:
        types - an array of types to search for
        from - start index
        to - end index
        Returns:
        a list of published offers with site() <= to-from for the given types

      • searchByTypesAndItemsAndOrg

        public static List<AHOffer> searchByTypesAndItemsAndOrg(String types,
                                                        String items,
                                                        long orgId,
                                                        int from,
                                                        int to,
                                                        Float lat,
                                                        Float lon,
                                                        Integer dist)
        Search all published offers for the given indices, a list of types, a list of items and the given organisation ID
        Parameters:
        types - string representation of a list of E_OfferType separated by comma, or null if not required
        items - string representation of a list of item IDs separated by comma, or null if not required
        orgId - an organisation ID or -1, if not required
        from - start index
        to - end index
        Returns:
        a list of published offers with site() <= to-from for the given parameters

        Converts a comma-separated string-representation of a list of numbers to an array
        Parameters:
        str - comma-separated list of Long
        Returns:
        the parsed array, may contain null values, where parsing failed
